version_description:
1. File upload optimization
2. Unify the color of the default avatar in multiple platforms
3. Official account added star
4. Delete account in the program
5. Camera, camera optimization
6. Image upload speed optimization
7. Optimize comm

1. In-app photos and videos will be stored locally
2. Improve the clarity of the video
3. Phone number display optimization
4. Preview file page supports left slide back
5. Optimized back to bottom speed
6. Weak network environment optimiza
fix display problem with unread count of message

Search chat optimization
Compatible with some special characters
Optmize network connection
Bug fixes and product improvements

At Notification: Support @group members for notification
Sync Chat History: You can download all history message from Me - Data and Storage - Sync Chat History for a new linked device.
Live Photos: Now you can send live photos to chats.
Optimize

1. Notification settings will be stored on the server
2. Long press the avatar to @groupmember
3. Bug fixes and product improvements

Feature
• Set self-destruct mode in private chat
• Add support for iPad
• Add support for sending long picture message
• Group admin could clear history for all members
• Auto-download setting for picture message
• Drop down in-app notif

New features
1. Long press the chat list to peek at the chat without marking it as read
2. Multi picture video media can be sent as a group
3. Unread bubbles can be dragged to eliminate
4. all media support more advanced search functions
5.

- Fix the scrolling issue of chat list.
- Fix the issue that iPad search results will not display.

- Now you can pin up to 5 messages to the top in the chat.
- You can sync all history to new members in encrypted group
- Tap the nickname of the forwarded message could jump to the source message.
- Bug fixes and product improvements

- Privacy settings- who can call me
- Auto-play video on message bubbles
- Bug fixes and product improvements

Chat input box supports paste pictures, videos, files to send
Picture message can be copied
Bug fixes and product improvements

- Group member management could set members' permissions of edit and delete messages
- Favorite sticker, recent sticker could be sync
- Group chat links are modified to HTTPS links
- Fix the problem of abnormal highlighting of some search results

- Voice messages could be converted to text locally
- Support non-bubble mode for chat UI
- Sharing files to other apps would retain the original name
- When editing a picture you could quickly cover face
- Bug fixes and product improvements

- Chat Folder
- Long messages will be folded by default
- Group management for Anonymous group
- New font size, line height and paragraph spacing settings for Notebook
- Support command + . = Esc for iPad
- New privacy settings for avatar,
